H0.text: Which Roman Emperor succeeded his father Vespasian in 79. Domitian

H1.text: Which Roman Emperor succeeded his father Vespasian in 79. Nerva

H2.text: Which Roman Emperor succeeded his father Vespasian in 79. Trajan

H3.text: Which Roman Emperor succeeded his father Vespasian in 79. Titus

A4.text: Vespasian died of an infection on 23 or 24 June 79 AD, and was immediately succeeded by his son Titus.

A5.text: After barely two years in office, Titus died of a fever on 13 September 81 AD. He was deified by the Roman Senate and succeeded by his younger brother Domitian.
